get.description: An endpoint that may be requested to check that server is up and running.

post.description: Attempt to authenticate to the API with the provided credentials.

201.description: Authentication is successful. The returned access token should be specified as the value of the `Authorization` header to authenticate further requests.

400.description: The provided credentials are either missing or of an invalid format.

401.description: Authentication failed. Credentials are likely invalid.

Unauthorized.description: Authentication failed due to accessing an endpoint that requires a valid access token or sending invalid credentials.

AccessToken.description: A character sequence generated by the server after an user has successfully authenticated using its credentials.

token.description: Generated character sequence that should be used to authenticate user requests.

expiresIn.description: Duration in seconds from the moment this token has been generated during which it is considered valid.

BearerToken.description: Authenticates requests with an access token generated by the /public/token endpoint.
